title: Software Developer 0
details: I worked on an internal tools development team. My work focused on code quality, performance tracking, CI/CD integrations, Internationalization, and virtual machine and Kubernetes deployment flows.

title: Sports Statistics Research Assistant
details: I conducted data collection, data analysis, and software development in conjunction with my supervisor, Dean Keith Willoughby - Edwards School of Business. I implemented Neural Networks to investigate data and research questions pertaining to professional curling in Canada.
